verse.name: v1
verse.lines: We praise thee, O God! for the Son of Thy love, For Jesus who died and is now gone above.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: We praise thee, O God! for Thy Spirit of light, Who has shown us our Savior and scattered our night.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: All glory and praise to the Lamb that was slain, Who has borne all our sins, and has cleansed ev'ry stain!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Revive us again; fill each heart with Thy love; May each soul be rekindled with fire from above.
